task_definition_name: Mifos Android Client: Add Margin to GroupActivity
description:
## Objective 
Add start and end margins to the `GroupActivity`

## Description
In the Group details page from the groups tab in the navigation drawer does not have the required start and end margin. This task is to add the required margin.

More details can be found on the following issue page  on GitHub:
https://github.com/openMF/android-client/issues/1192

## How to get help
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
